title: Meal Planning
description: Plan your meals around expiring items to maximize freshness and minimize waste.
proTip: Check your nearly expired items every morning and plan your day’s meals accordingly.

title: Smart Storage
description: Learn proper storage techniques to extend the life of your food items.
proTip: Store fruits and vegetables separately; keep dairy products in the coldest part of your fridge.

title: Share with Community
description: Consider sharing excess food with neighbors or local food banks.
proTip: Build connections while reducing waste by sharing food that you can’t consume in time.
